kpi.name: LTE_179a
kpi.formula:
decode( (lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs0 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs1 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs2 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs3 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs4 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs5 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs6 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs7 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs8 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs9 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs10 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs11 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs12 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs13 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs14 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs15 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs16 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs17 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs18 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs19 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs20 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs21 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs22 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs23 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs24 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs25 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs26 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs27 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs28),0,null,
(100*(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs5)) / (lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs0 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs1 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs2 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs3 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs4 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs5 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs6 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs7 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs8 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs9 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs10 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs11 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs12 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs13 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs14 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs15 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs16 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs17 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs18 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs19 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs20 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs21 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs22 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs23 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs24 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs25 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs26 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs27 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs28))

kpi_info.title: Perc PDSCH TRANS MCS5
kpi_info.use: Percentage of Transport Blocks transmitted on PDSCH ( DL-SCH) using Code MCS_5
kpi_info.formula:
100 * sum( PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS5 )
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
sum( PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS0 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS1 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS2 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS3 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS4 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS5 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS6 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS7 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS8 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS9 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS10 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS11 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS12 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS13 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS14 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS15 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS16 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS17 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS18 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS19 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS20 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS21 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS22 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS23 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS24 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS25 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS26 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS27 + PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS28 )

null
